DOC.brief_summary: To test whether International Diabetes Federation - Western Pacific Region ( IDF-WPR ) Guidelines effective standard practice primary care ( general practitioner ) clinic management type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) Asia . A 12-month multinational multicentre prospective cluster randomisation clinical trial within primary care setting , 2 parallel treatment arm : diabetes management use IDF-WPR guideline versus standard clinic practice . 400 subject recruit 100 site ( 4 subject per site ) ten Asian country ( China , Hong Kong , Indonesia , Korea , Malaysia , Philippines , Singapore , Taiwan , Thailand Vietnam ) .
